tooltip: Select Praetorian as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: The Preatorian focuses on guarding Gohma bases.
Allows you to summon Praetorian, a large defensive hero with very durable armor.
Durable Creature unit with very high armor values.
Hive Nodes can be upgraded into Mite Mounds and Acid Batches.
Gohma Buildings regenerate faster and have more armor.
